creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: irregularly shaped ceramic bowl with flat bottom and high sides; irregular design and texture on outer walls with chunky, wavy horizontal lines, impressed rectangles, etc.; dark earth tone glaze with some white patches and rust colored swirls; interior has a series of raised irregular rings
markings: On blue wrapping cloth in box: [ 高内秀剛 ]
medium: Stoneware with Oribe glaze, iron painting
title: Bowl (hachi)
